rimson Lake beetles were a species of desert insect found in the sweltering sands of the Great Anauroch.
The crimson color in the beetles name referred to the insects use in making a red-colored dye, making them a valuable commodity.
By the late 15 century DR, Crimson Lake beetle-dyed leather helmets became a common sight in West Faer√ªn, the Western Heartlands, and the city of Baldurs Gate.
